import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Employee } from '../../interface/employee'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { EmployeeService } from '../../Service/employee.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employee-details', templateUrl: './employee-details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employee-details.component.css'] }) export class EmployeeDetailsComponent { id: any; employee: Employee = {} as Employee; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private employeeService: EmployeeService, private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.id = this.route.snapshot.params['id']; this.employeeService.getEmployeeById(this.id).subscribe(data =>{ this.employee = data; console.log(data); }); } updateAccountBank(id: number){ this.router.navigate(['update-account-bank', id]); alert("Update SuccessFully"); } }
